I have completed a brief exploration of the AutoGPT codebase. Here is what I found:

## Codebase Overview

This is the **AutoGPT** project - an open-source autonomous AI agent platform. The repository contains:

**Main Components:**
- `autogpt_platform/` - The main platform containing:
  - `backend/` - Python/FastAPI backend server
  - `frontend/` - Next.js/React frontend application
- `classic/` - The original/classic AutoGPT implementation
- `docs/` - Documentation

**Recent Work (based on git status):**
The repository has active development on a "Diamond Baseline" feature:
- Backend routes: `c:/Users/1/Desktop/AutoGPT-master/autogpt_platform/backend/backend/server/v2/diamond/`
- Frontend page: `c:/Users/1/Desktop/AutoGPT-master/autogpt_platform/frontend/src/app/(platform)/diamond-baseline/`
- Data module: `c:/Users/1/Desktop/AutoGPT-master/autogpt_platform/backend/backend/data/diamond_baseline.py`

**Technology Stack:**
- Backend: Python with FastAPI
- Frontend: TypeScript/React with Next.js
- Database: Prisma ORM (based on project structure)

I am ready to assist with any planning or exploration tasks for this codebase. Please provide your requirements when you are ready.
